title: The Jaxon Effect
description: The first installment of the Jaxon Effect Trilogy is a fast paced and sexy page turner that has all the goods.DR. Kate Sims suffered a horrible break-up. To make matters worse it was on her wedding day. Afraid of ever getting too close to another person again Kate managed to avoid relationships. It wasn't until she met the dark and mysterious Jaxon Remington that things quickly changed. Jaxon Remington was a strip club owner from Manhattan that didn't do relationships. He learned the hard way what happens when you trust the wrong person and vowed never to get involved in another relationship again. That was until he met Dr. Kate Sims. No matter how hard he tried to ignore it, the chemistry between them was undeniable.A mutual decision to experience one evening of passion turned sour and the aftermath was more than either of them bargained for. When Kate and her best friend's lives are in danger due to serious threats from an Ex with a proven track record to follow through Kate has no choice but to turn to Jaxon for help at the risk of losing her heart to a man that wasn't capable of love. A man that held many dark secrets.
author: K.C.  Michaels
